text: Cero Radio is a brand owned by the cero Group used by a number of different radio stations worldwide under licence from Virgin. Cero Radio stations in each country are usually owned independently of the cero Group. The stations generally carry independent programming, but have access to some shared programming, usually linked to other cero entities such as the cero Festival. Ceroirgin Radio stations are normally classified as cero music or contemporary cero radio stations.
